title: Mariah Carey Kisses Summer Goodbye With Epic Bikini Shot!
text:
Mariah Carey is saying goodbye to summer and making sure fans know she has an incredible body in the process.

Mimi, who is now fabulously 49 years old, shared a post closing out Labor Day weekend on Tuesday.

Wearing a tiny black bikini with a halter neckline, Mariah showed that her body is on fire!

"From the summer to the fall, we migrate," the singer wrote, adding the hashtag "bye."

In the snap, Mariah is smiling sweetly and matching her bathing suit with the perfect poolside heels.

With her hair flowing in the wind, she showed off her toned stomach and legs while leaving the summer season behind.

The Lambily Speak:

View photos

Fans are going nuts over the shot and making sure to dish Mimi out plenty of compliments, even bringing up Britney Spears' famous line, "skinny as a needle."

"Was this taken today, or in 1991? Could truly be either. Ageless Legend," one fan commented. "Queen of looking 22 at 49," said another.

And many are pumped that with summer closing, Mariah's can flourish in her favorite season.

"Fall means that the Christmas Queen is approaching!" wrote one person.

Bikini Ready:

View photos

This isn't the first time Mariah has flaunted her bikini body this year.

The songbird showed she's been ready to slip into a two-piece all year long.

In January, she shared several pictures wearing a sparkling pink string bikini while in St. Barts on a family vacation.

Two-Piece Invasion!

View photos

Mariah is just the latest star to post a sexy bikini shot.

She joins Salma Hayek, who just flaunted her summer body. The actress shared a post in a turquoise two-piece days ago on her 53rd birthday.

And while Mariah may say "I don't know her," 50-year-old J Lo also showcased her insane body on Tuesday.

Mariah is QUEEN:

Gotta hand it to Mariah.

The singer proves that no matter what age, she will always be fabulous, darling!
description: Mariah Carey flaunts her bikini body as summer comes to an end.
